summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to City excise taxes, amending Seattle Municipal Code Section 5.44.026 to amend the definition of "Sale at retail" or "retail sale"; amending Section 5.44.030 to change the classification of periodicals and magazines; amending Section 5.44.110 to add a deduction for privately operated kindergartens and non-profit organizations providing credit counseling services; and amending Section 5.48.070 to clarify the deduction of excise taxes.
